COLLEGE OF JOURNALISM AND COMMUNICATIONS
IU
\ersity of Illinois, Urbana
Dec 12
Dear Bill:
Thanks for your 2 notes. I'll be glad to serve on
the Board...subject only to the absence of travel
funds to make possible travel at University expense.
I hope that won't be an obstacle.
Re: Arno Huth.. I had thought of his knowledge of
Africa and other places...and had planned to do essenÂ¬
tially what you have done...Would it be possible to
retain him as a general consultant, as well, for a small
sum per year? I also intended to see if what we got would
make something like this poasible..Since his name as
one of our advisors would, I know, command considerable
respect..
Glad you got to meet the Shinkmans. Hope something
materializes there.
Finally, guess Hill gets to be in Washington for a
snow-storm...Hope all of Jrou are not too paralyzed...
Oh, yes..In your letter, you say that Pearl and the
gang send regards.. I know a Jewell, for instance, and
a Cam (ee-yoh?)...but a Pearl? Unmystify me..
Rega
Harry Sk
